name: HeliCube
description:
HeliCube a game Easy to play and somewhat addictive.

In this early access game you play as a cube trying to collect points by picking up purple cubes. Try to survive all the obstacles that are coming your way and get to the finish line.

Feel free to comment on bugges, how we can make the game better and general fixes.

Thanks for being apart of the development of HeliCube.
